skills.name: Dark Claw
skills.description: Attacks the enemy with sharp claws of darkness. Inflicts Continuous Damage for 2 turns if you get a Critical Hit.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +5%

skill_effect.name: Continuous DMG
skill_effect.description: Deals 5% of monster's max HP as damage every turn

skills.name: Solid Blades
skills.description: Increases your Attack Power and Critical Rate for 3 turns. Additionally, your Attack Bar increases by 50%.

skill_effect.name: Increase ATB
skill_effect.description: The ATK bar of ally monsters is filled by a set amount. This allows ally monsters to attack again sooner.

skill_effect.name: Increase CRI Rate
skill_effect.description: Critical Hit Rate is increased by 30%

skills.name: Power of Darkness
skills.description: Reflects 30% of the incoming damage for 3 turns and keeps your HP from falling under 1.

skill_effect.name: Endure
skill_effect.description: Monster temporarily cannot be killed as HP cannot go below 1

skill_effect.name: Reflect DMG
skill_effect.description: 33% of incoming damage is reflected back at the attacker. This does not nullify any Status Effects.
